name: PLAYBOOK
description:
IF MTV AND ROCKBAND HAD A BABY......

PLAYBOOK is a new approach to a music video network - playable music videos.

Real bands - real music. A place to discover the artist as well as the music. Another outlet for bands to reach new and existing audiences.

PLAYBOOK is focused on Rock, Metal and Punk music - bands you may know, as well as bands you might like to discover, and get to know better.

Play Guitar or Drums on over 10 tracks by real bands. Each track has 2 Levels of Difficulty.

Every gameplay session puts you on stage playing along to the official video for that song.
